divs: Sighting Detailswass taking pic of the contrail that u see in the pic,noticed 5 bright round metalic objects near the contrail grabed cam an snaped 1 pic b4 they,well just disappeared.weather was clear and a little brezzy,temp wass bout 58-61.was at my apartment sitting on floor in front of tv playing a video game with my friend zac,i noticed the objects when i looked at the contrail,i had no idea what they were,but the one on the bottom right was leaving a slight trail as it went thru contrail.the objects were moving slow and in a triangle type formation.the bottom right was the brightest.all i felt was just wow.after i took the pic looked down at the pic an went to take another pic an they were gone
